row.process:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off : CASE "UNIX" ! <Begin of sudo script> : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
! include tomcattool.jar :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH
! header :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! call tomcat-tool java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#tomcat-tool.jar" discovery Tomcat
! footer :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
